abstract: Describes a section of suggestions items in a suggestions menu

# NSSuggestionItemSection

**Structure**

Describes a section of suggestions items in a suggestions menu

## Declaration

```swift
struct NSSuggestionItemSection<SuggestionItemType>
```

## Initializers

- **init(items:)**
- **init(title:items:)**

## Instance Properties

- **items**: The items that appear in this section
- **title**: The title of this section of items, or `nil` to have a untitled section of items

## Type Aliases

- **NSSuggestionItemSection.Item**: A suggestion item with the same suggestion item type as the section

## Supporting Text Completion and Suggestions

- **isAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text field automatically completes text as the user types.
- **NSTextSuggestionsDelegate**: A protocol for suggestion delegates of text fields to conform to in order to provide text suggestions in response to the user typing.
- **NSSuggestionItem**: The items that appear in suggestion menus.
- **NSSuggestionItemResponse**: Describes the result of a batch of suggestion items from a search

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
